article_text:
Even a little Ebola may have a big a effect on the health care system.

New York City now has one patient -- Dr. Craig Spencer -- with confirmed Ebola, and three patients who are in quarantine as a result of their association with Spencer.

What do those cases mean for the agents and brokers already wrestling with the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (PPACA) provisions and programs that affect the commercial health insurance market?

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Allison Bell
article_metadata.description: When an unpredictable force meets an incomprehensible object, what do you tell your clients?

og.description: When an unpredictable force meets an incomprehensible object, what do you tell your clients?
og.title: Ebola vs. PPACA: 3 effects

article_summary:
Even a little Ebola may have a big a effect on the health care system.
New York City now has one patient -- Dr. Craig Spencer -- with confirmed Ebola, and three patients who are in quarantine as a result of their association with Spencer.
What do those cases mean for the agents and brokers already wrestling with the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (PPACA) provisions and programs that affect the commercial health insurance market?
